column1: Kata Robata////I'm just going to review the things I ate (since my fiance has a Yelp account and will review the things he ate anyways). The pork gyoza was okay... the dough was really good and the pork was just okay
column2: and they were smaller than I thought they would be based on the pictures from other people. The yellowtail robata was pretty good
column3: though I thought it would benefit from a little salt. I suppose that's what they soy sauce/ginger is for.
